channel.title: How do I find my coordinates [317, PI]
channel.description: Well I'm trying to move some npc's around to a completely new area with no other npc's around it, but I can't find my coordinates so I don't know where to put them. How can I find my coordinates?

item.title: How do I find my coordinates [317, PI]
item.dc:creator: @Crazyjackson78 Crazyjackson78
item.description:
@Crazyjackson78 wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:2, topic:377579”]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“mypos”)) {
c.sendMessage("X: “+c.absX+” Y: “+c.absY+” H: "+c.heightLevel);
}[/quote]

Thank you VERY much

Read full topic
item.source: How do I find my coordinates [317, PI]

item.title: How do I find my coordinates [317, PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) {
			c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX+" Y: "+c.absY+" H: "+c.heightLevel);
		}
